channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Oracle’s AI Push Is Leading to Its Worst Quarter Since 2001
item.description: Delayed AI infrastructure projects, rising debt, and weaker-than-expected earnings are reviving dot-com-era fears on Wall Street.

item.title: LG’s Monstrous 52-Inch 5K Gaming Monitor Will Swallow Up Your Desk
What a knob! Startup shoves circular controller in tiny laptop dock to create perfect desktop companion — shame you have to wait four months to get it
item.description: HubKey Pro 2 is a crowdfunded circular controller with fully customizable keys and a dual-4K multi-functional hub.

item.title: What we listened to in 2025
item.description: If streaming services’ year-in-review campaigns have shown us anything, it’s that we’ve spent a staggering amount of time drowning out the hum of everyday life with music, podcasts and audio series. And with some incredible new releases this year, we were really eatin’ good. Here are some of the Engadget team’s favorite things we listened to in 2025.Spiritbox - Tsunami SeaI became aware of Spiritbox in late 2024 shortly before the band dropped its latest album, Tsunami Sea. At the time, I was in a deep Sleep Token phase, and I don’t remember how I stumbled upon Spiritbox, but I’m sure glad I d...

item.title: Starlink Rival Launches Its Largest Satellite Yet for Space-Based Cellular Network
item.description: AST SpaceMobile wants to launch up to 60 of its satellites in 2026.

item.title: Just unwrapped a new laptop? These are the perfect accessories under $70 I recommend you get
item.description: Got a new laptop for Christmas? These are the must-have accessories I recommend to everyone.

item.title: How the ‘Demon Slayer’ Studio Broke Laws of Anime Physics to Bring ‘Infinity Castle’ Fights to Life
item.description: Ufotable digs into the technical and artistic magic that propelled the film's generational battle between Tanjiro and Akaza.

item.title: The glorious, easy-to-miss moments in Heated Rivalrys finale
item.description: The season one finale of the hit series did not miss a chance to show the deep affection between its lead characters.

item.title: Elon Musk Says He’s Removing ‘Sustainable’ From Tesla’s Mission
item.description: The future is "amazing," it's not necessarily sustainable.

item.title: Can AI help solve the power problem it created?
item.description: Break down silos between the public and private sectors to treat energy as a strategic asset. Artificial intelligence is transforming how we cure disease, defend nations, and deliver goods. But the same technology driving this surge of innovation is also testing the limits of the system that supports it. Innovation is moving faster than infrastructure, and our energy strategy has to catch up.It’s time to manage energy as a strategic asset. While AI is fueling demand at historic levels, it also gives us the tools to use power more intelligently, stabilize the grid, and unlock capacity we alread...

item.title: ‘Zombie Stars’ Might Be a Beacon in Our Search for Dark Matter
item.description: To answer odd questions, physicists have odd ideas.

item.title: As people look for ways to make new friends, here are the apps promising to help
item.description: We've compiled a list of friendship apps, from friend discovery platforms like BFF to event-focused ones like Timeleft.

item.title: How RGB Mini-LED will transform the premium TV landscape in 2026
item.description: Mini-LED TVs that use RGB backlighting tech will arrive in a wider range of screen sizes from a wide array of brands in 2026. Should OLED TVs be worried?

item.title: Apple's iPad in 2025: the highs, lows, and what we want to see in 2026
item.description: Apple’s 2025 iPad lineup wasn’t about flashy redesigns, but meaningful performance upgrades and the arrival of iPadOS 26 combined to deliver the most complete iPad experience yet.

item.title: Virginia offshore wind developer sues after Trump administration halts project
item.description: Dominion’s project has been under construction since early 2024 and was scheduled to come online early next year. The developers of a Virginia offshore wind project are asking a federal judge to block a Trump administration order that halted construction of their project, along with four others, over national security concerns.

item.title: Rodeo is an app for making plans with friends you already have
item.description: There are plenty of dating apps out there and apps that turn your chaos of work obligations into easily actionable lists. There is also a growing number of apps that help you make new friends. The pitch for Rodeo is a bit different in that it uses AI to help you schedule activities with your […]

item.title: South Park Writer Snagged ‘Trump-Kennedy Center’ Web Domains Months Ago
item.description: The writer has made a habit of acquiring official-sounding domains for satirical purposes.

item.title: The Truth About the ‘Stranger Things’ Upside Down Was in Place Back in Season 1
item.description: However, viewers were kept in the dark until season five's second batch of episodes, now streaming on Netflix.

item.title: Stocks hover at record highs after Christmas as gold and silver prices rise
item.description: Gold and silver prices continued to climb, with silver rising more than 7% to $76.88 an ounce. Stocks moved slightly lower in midday Friday trading as investors returned from the Christmas holiday. Trading is expected to be light.
